website_summaries.verdict: Offering supreme durability and versatility, this popular angle broom provides exceptional cleaning.
pros: Has a nice 9 1/2-inch sweeping path and a full long length of 50 1/2 inches
Built to work on both indoor and outdoor surfaces
Bristles are flagged for collecting tiny dust particles
Steel head and handle offers owners a sturdy, long-lasting product
cons: Buyers wish the broom head was wider

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: The handle to this broom came in two pieces to be fitted together. It started coming apart after a few minutes of sweeping. I kept fitting it back together and it would come apart again. The next day there was no holding it together at all. A friend of mine drilled a screw hole in the metal handle and screwed it together. If you don't have a friend who can do this, however, I recommend you get a different broom
customer_reviews.author: hollandh

customer_reviews.title: Its just ok
customer_reviews.text: Been using this room for several months now. First thing I noticed is it does not like to stand on its own weight. It needs to be hung from the top. Otherwise it causes the bristles to want to bend. Also the bristles to flare out with wear. Just like any other room. I like it that it's very narrow. And fairly lightweight. But not worse the money in the long run. Also, the broom comes into pieces with a rubber gasket of sorts where the two pieces go together. After a few months at peace became brittle and broke. My husband was able to reattach the pieces. Hoping I can find a replacement gasket. Very disappointing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Stiff as a board
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this broom. Bristles are thick and hard. Not good for inside cleaning. Good for cleaning outside patio I purchased same broom many many years ago from fuller brush company and it was a great broom back then. Maybe this one is seconds
customer_reviews.author: picky shopper Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vintage Find
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these Watson brooms and loved it. It finally wore out somev15 years later. My husband was constantly reminding me to get another one. When I saw one advertiIsed on AMAZON, I immediately ordered one. Received igt in no time and set to work sweeping. It gets in the corner and with the type of bristles it has, it helps keep the dust down. Love it. Oh yes, the price was even less than I expected. Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda K. Dixson

customer_reviews.title: It is very nicely made and sturdy enough for more than what I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a somewhat smaller household broom. It is very nicely made and sturdy enough for more than what I need. The handle is two parts, but the second part fits very snug into the first and I have no doubts about it staying in there. There is a metal hanging loop, like whisk brooms often have. Lightweight and easy to use. The bristles are synthetic, very sturdy. I think if you needed to you could scrub with this broom. I like it, it's my first Fuller product.
customer_reviews.author: KissaMewTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this broom because I'm trying to reduce the amount of plastic in my house and wanted a nice, sturdy broom. When it came, I was surprised by how small it is. It's about 2/3 the width of a regular broom, so it requires more sweeping to cover the same amount of floor space. The bristles don't have any give, so you can't make them spread out to cover more space. It's actually a total pain in the neck to sweep with! But, it sure looks pretty! I regret spending $39.99, that's for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Sara R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent broom
customer_reviews.text: My wood-handle corn husk broom was a disaster that lasted less than 6 months. With every sweep, there was loss of bristles until I ended up sweeping with an odd shaped stump that got smaller and smaller over time. This one is outstanding. The handle is comfortable to grip, no chance of splinters. Lightweight. I use a broom multiple times per day to clean up the seed from my balcony (from feeding squirrels and birds). Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Hemingway

customer_reviews.title: Not like the good 'ole Fuller broom!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this broom, which was purchased to replace my previous Fuller split-bristle broom. I don't see any split bristles on the new broom. Also, it is skimpy and skinny in comparison to the older model. Too bad that even Fuller seems to have cheapened their product. I have a better broom from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Pachka

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expected at this price
customer_reviews.text: The broom is sturdy and has an angled thick broom; however after just a few uses the longest bristles at the end have started to splay out and now sweeping is not as consies and the wayward bristles tend to distribute particles rather than capture and combine them, not what a new broom should be doing.....
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Still my favorite broom!
customer_reviews.text: This is still my favorite broom! My last broom finally gave up. I tried a new brand and it is now used outside....just didn't do the job. So I went back to my Fuller Brush broom. Love it. It needs to be hung up, and then it lasts for years and years!
customer_reviews.author: Karen M

customer_reviews.title: Love this broom
customer_reviews.text: This broom is awesome. I have one for me in the house and my husband kept taking it for the garage. So I bought another one. Now we both have one. fuller makes a great product. The brooms last, stay intact and sweep the guck on the floor right up.
customer_reviews.author: Sueb

customer_reviews.title: The Best Outdoor Broom
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a much older version of this broom over 20 years ago. I now two of this newer version, one for the backyard and one for the front of the house. The price is a little steep, however the broom's performance makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that it was a plastic bristle brush but the engineered feather ends actually do a very nice job of fine dust and debris clean up. It’s a pricey broom but the dust pick up and push into the dust pan is worth it to us. Great broom.
customer_reviews.author: Nick De

customer_reviews.title: Great broom for getting into corners
customer_reviews.text: I've always preferred a natural brooms but this one works really well for a synthetic bristle. Best broom I've purchased I a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L

customer_reviews.title: Fuller Angle Broom--built for cleaning!!!
customer_reviews.text: This broom is built strong and ready for work!! Get into those hard to reach places in no time with this very efficient Fuller broom. Use indoor or outdoor and the results are the same---noticeable clean areas. Worth the cost. AAA+++
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Robert W. Putnick Jr.

customer_reviews.title: great broom....low maintenance and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: great brown. Firm bristles and doesn't produce a lot of static which helps with stuff that usually clings on. So I don't actually have to spend a lot of time CLEANING MY BROOM, which is ridiculous. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie Klaas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a medium soft bristle broom to use with my floor level eye vac. This broom is perfect for sweeping small particles including scattered kitty litter directly to the vac. Also, the angled bristles reach in corners much better than the straight ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G. Miller

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: This Fuller Brush broom is the best ever! I tossed out all of my other rooms and finally bought the BEST!
customer_reviews.author: N. Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Great broom
customer_reviews.text: Love this broom. So much better than the ones I bought at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Use it every day inside and out. Particularly great outside on Textured patio.
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Works fine...
customer_reviews.text: but I was expecting the old style bristles. It, fortunately!, does not weigh the 6.5 pounds listed under "product details." It does what a broom needs to do, but when I saw Fuller Brush brand I pictured the brooms the Fuller Brush man used to demonstrate to my mother when I was a small child (OK, I'm old!) It is a fine broom. It sweeps stuff up.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Nice broom for light work
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice light weight broom. The bristles could be a little stiffer but for small jobs, this does the job.
customer_reviews.author: LofLV

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: We love this broom, great for indoor or outdoor use. The first one purchased wandered outside because it was so sturdy - to clean the roof, gutters, and patio. This one is for Indoor use only!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly VanHulle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works really well in corners. Gets up more dirt than any broom that I ever used.
customer_reviews.author: jziyad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for sweeping ice & snow from porch & steps!
customer_reviews.author: COLONEL "C"

customer_reviews.title: Another great Fuller Brush product
customer_reviews.text: I love this broom. I had one like it for many years. It does such a great job of sweeping and it is light weight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa J.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I expected a good quality Fuller broom. So disappointed for $39. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Irene J. Oswald

customer_reviews.title: High Quality for the Same Price
customer_reviews.text: This is no crappy broom. For the same price you would pay for a junk broom at a hardware store, you can have this high quality broom that is a joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Birch

customer_reviews.title: Hipster broom
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice quality broom. I wish it was just a little bit wider. It's super stylish tho.
customer_reviews.author: Christenm

customer_reviews.title: Great. It gets even the small stuff
customer_reviews.text: Other than the two piece handle it seems to be the same broom as the 1970s version my parents had. Great. It gets even the small stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks like it will do the job this winter on my ramp to rempve the snow
customer_reviews.author: Linda J Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Love this broom.
customer_reviews.text: Love this broom. Had a in the past and loved it. It does a really good job. Bought a second one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Christian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and long lasting. This is my second one. One fot the kitchen and one for the garage.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with quality and price. We have one from 20 years ago, similar construction. Brush bristles quality is different, but works satisfactorily.
customer_reviews.author: d & d

customer_reviews.title: Great broom! Strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great broom! Strong and sturdy; sweeps dirt and debris easily. We've only had it a few months, but it certainly feels like it will hold up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: BCY

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sweep!
customer_reviews.text: Better than any broom purchsed at a retail store, I would recommend this product. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Music Listener!

customer_reviews.title: Fuller Brush still rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Don't think about the cost of this broom, just know it will hold up for YEARS. High quality, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Burch

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, really like it and ordered 2 more to have a extra and give one away
customer_reviews.author: utah blue

customer_reviews.title: Timeless tool
customer_reviews.text: It is just like the broom my mother had,with a couple modern updates.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise love the quality and look
customer_reviews.text: Some of the brush pieces are sticking out suddenly. Otherwise love the quality and look.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Elf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent broom, great quality. Can be used for indoor or outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: L.Henderson

customer_reviews.title: advertized as all metal. instead, bristles are plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: advertized as all metal. instead, bristles are plastic painted grey. handle is too short and broom is too narrow. is not the heavy-duty outside broom i thought i was buying.
customer_reviews.author: susan adelman

customer_reviews.title: It's a good broom, but sometimes it comes apart at the handle
customer_reviews.text: It's a good broom. The handle is two steel pieces and it's force fitted. The bristles are high quality. One complain I have about this broom is that the two steel broom handle pieces come apart. I guess I did not push the pieces together with enough force. I think that a small screw should be included with the broom to keep the pieces together. SO: It's high quality - That's for sure, but the only problem is the handle. I gave it four stars because of the quality - It's well made and will last for a while. I think it might be too expensive at $40 bucks. I'd gladly pay $20 for it again.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE A. DUARTE

customer_reviews.title: Good strong old school broom
customer_reviews.text: A broom is one of those tools you would think they'd never change. But try to find a decent one at the big box store. We have had a bunch of wimply brooms that don't sweep worth a darn. This broom is not wimpy, and it does the job. Yes it's pricey but I think it will last. The handle comes in two pieces to allow it to fit into a smaller box for shipping. That may be the weak point, but hasn't broken there yet.
customer_reviews.author: Doc W8

customer_reviews.title: Weak stitching
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old Fuller broom - which I loved. This one is a disappointment as the stitching didn't last a month. I so wanted to buy from a US company that I thought would be good quality. I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but a bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: The handle comes in two parts that have to be fitted together. It's not made of wood, but metal, and that's why it's a bit heavy. I also thought the bristles would be natural, but they are some sort of plastic. Still, I like Fuller products in general, and I have the feeling this broom will last a lifetime. It does fit in corners and gathers the dirt well. The size of the broom is exactly what I wanted as I need it only for indoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Hate to shop

customer_reviews.title: Love the angled brush!
customer_reviews.text: two reasons I purchased this broom: 1. My mom had one for years and I knew how well it moves the dirt, etc., on the floor. It is far superior to any other broom I've used. 2. The angle on ;the broom head gets into all corners! I would purchase this broom again even at this very high price!
customer_reviews.author: Bookwomanjr

customer_reviews.title: Fancy, well made broom.
customer_reviews.text: Who likes sweeping the floor? This broom is fun to use because it is unique and "fancy". It also seems well-made and durable. I got tired of picking up pieces of my old fashioned broom all the time. Thinking of hanging it on the wall of my mudroom as an industrial piece of art.
customer_reviews.author: H. Jane Chihal

customer_reviews.title: Great Broom
customer_reviews.text: Just forget buying straw brooms or any others from hardware stores. This Fuller Brush Broom is the best. We live in a wooded area in Northern AZ where it is often windy, with needles accumulating on our deck. Lightweight in use yet swoops those needles up in a flash. You won't be disappointed. It will last a long time too.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Junebug

customer_reviews.title: Best Broom on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I have used these brooms from Fuller Brush for over 40 years. They are the best on the market. The angle is perfect for getting under cabinets and the bristles keep everything together until picking up in dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: Vikaroo

customer_reviews.title: dog hair clings to this
customer_reviews.text: hard to get hair off the brush... other brands didn't have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: awkward penguin

customer_reviews.title: A happy sweeper
customer_reviews.text: I love this broom! I have always used corn brooms and this one seems like it will not only last longer, but it also sweeps easier and cleaner. I am a happy sweeper!
customer_reviews.author: Kenaveco

customer_reviews.title: The brrom is exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This broom really does sweep up tiny particles such as salt or sugar. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen E. Finlay

customer_reviews.title: Clean sweep
customer_reviews.text: A broom that really does the job. Go to Fuller for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Nater

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Always used to purchase fuller brush and sell it I was so happy that I have found thus
customer_reviews.author: Berta

customer_reviews.title: Best Broom EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the broom. It is light weight but gets the job done. It does not cause static so all dirt goes in the dust pan. I have two - on for my house and one for my camper. . . will not use another one.
customer_reviews.author: Shop til you drop

customer_reviews.title: Not great for pet hair because there is no static to ...
customer_reviews.text: Not great for pet hair because there is no static to keep the clumps together, it makes them just float around. I will use it as an outdoor broom instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sturdiness of the product
customer_reviews.text: Product is very sturdy and is used mainly to clean out chicken runs. Very good and handy
customer_reviews.author: loretta

customer_reviews.title: Love these brooms
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I have always used the corn brooms. Bought one of these Fuller brooms about a year ago and can I tell the difference. They sweep so much better. Just bought 2 more, one for my basement and one for a gift for my daughter for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: skd

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars..I love it !
customer_reviews.text: Love this broom !!!!! It's light weight and sweeps perfectly. I hope I have it for a very long time.It's nice to hear from the Seller,they really want to make sure I'm happy ..and I am.
customer_reviews.author: Terri's stuff

customer_reviews.title: Fuller been around for years!
customer_reviews.text: Great broom. Cannot go wrong with buying Fuller products! Like!
customer_reviews.author: barbara gilyeat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: there are no brooms to compare to the Fuller Brush broom.
customer_reviews.author: Meaux

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this. the bristles are plastic and the handle is aluminum. Super happy I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Great, American made broom!
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time fuller brush customer and was in need of another broom. This is well made and is a huge step up from the cheap brooms that you see everywhere. The broom handle breaks down to make it easy to ship and once put together, is pretty solid. I'd like if it was a bit longer, since I am pretty tall and have to bend a bit to sweep.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Bristles are not soft on the end. Probably ordered the wrong broom.
customer_reviews.author: KJW

customer_reviews.title: A broom is not just the broom
customer_reviews.text: Awesome brom not flimsy like the grocery store brands Ridgid well built sturdy looks like it would last a lifetime glad I purchased it
customer_reviews.author: moora3

customer_reviews.title: It's Fuller Brush,  of course it's good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to use in the garage and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dama

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it for his woodshop. Now I want one!
customer_reviews.author: 2dropshop

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, feels good
customer_reviews.text: Seems to leave behind a small amount of kitchen floor debris... Looks nice, feels good, but just not loving it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Scilla

customer_reviews.title: My brushing is much fuller
customer_reviews.text: I used to sell their products so I knew the quality to be superior and this vendor shipped fast, best price. Very pleased . Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Smart purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and it fits in with my new remodeled kitchen color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Maestrak

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected. the only complaint is too ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. the only complaint is too short a handle.
customer_reviews.author: JLOPPY

customer_reviews.title: Should work out.
customer_reviews.text: A little thinner than I expected, but seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: AGK

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used it yet as it is a son's birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet as it is a son's birthday gift for his garage. I think it will work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Francene Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect . . . now if it will only last for many years as advertised!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DIANE

product_meta.title: Fuller Brush Versatile Angle Broom – Complete – 9 1/2” Sweeping Path - Good for Hard to Reach Areas – Both Indoor & Outdoor Use
feature_bullets: EFFICIENT SWEEPING: Grab a Fuller! – Get it all swept with this US made sturdy broom – designed to help you efficiently clean your floors - ideal for every task!
SUPERIOR CLEANUP: These long lasting split-ended polypropylene bristles are designed to collect all that dirt and small particles – resisting chemicals, oil and grease.
INDOOR & OUTDOOR USE: Works even in your foyer, basement, garage; on the deck or patio - this all-purpose angled broom reaches into all corners and under objects.
LONG LASTING: With a steel handle and head casing and durable bristles – this Fuller Brush broom is virtually indestructible with regular use.
Since 1906, Fuller Brush has provided you high-quality American made products that are designed to work and built to last.
